com.basho.riak.client.core.query.crdt.types

Class RiakCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.crdt.types.RiakDatatype
      • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.crdt.types.RiakCounter

  • public class RiakCounter
extends RiakDatatype
    Representation of the Riak counter datatype.

    This is an immutable value returned when querying Riak for a counter datatype.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dave Rusek
